title: These deeply discounted bands will freshen your old Apple Watch for cheap
content:
Macworld

Apple Watches are super awesome, but you sometimes have to swap out your band because it broke off or it’s too worn out. Thankfully, loads of bands are on sale right now at Amazon.

One of the coolest choices you have is the Apple Watch Sport Band in orange, which is suitable for 38mm, 40mm, and 41mm devices. Usually available for $49, you can grab this one for a mere $35.70 right now, a rare sale for one of Apple’s official bands. The band is made out of a super durable and strong material that’s soft to the touch.

If you’re not adamant about buying an Apple-made band to go with your watch, you can choose this Amsky six-pack for a mere $9.60. This is a Prime deal, but there’s also a $3 coupon on the page, so that’s the lowest price you can spend for six bands. The silicone bands will work with Apple Watches in 38mm, 40mm, and 41mm. The version available for larger smartwatches is also on sale for $14 with a Prime membership. All six bands come in different colors, and there are multiple combinations available.

Installing either of these is super easy and they all look gorgeous so no matter if you go for the Apple original or the more affordable six-pack, we’re sure you’ll have a great time making your watch match your style.
